wiki.summary: 'LIFETIMES' (stylized in uppercase) by Katy Perry is the second single off her sixth album, '143'. It is also the sixth track on the record. The song is dedicated to Katy Perry's daughter Daisy and how they would have a connection no matter what reality/lifetime they were in. The song was first teased in the Apple Music interview, along with the song 'GORGEOUS' that features Kim Petras. The Music Video to this track was released along with the song itself, where the singer has fun partying on vacation. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: 'LIFETIMES' (stylized in uppercase) by Katy Perry is the second single off her sixth album, '143'. It is also the sixth track on the record. The song is dedicated to Katy Perry's daughter Daisy and how they would have a connection no matter what reality/lifetime they were in. The song was first teased in the Apple Music interview, along with the song 'GORGEOUS' that features Kim Petras. The Music Video to this track was released along with the song itself, where the singer has fun partying on vacation. 'LIFETIMES' is a pop techno-house song, with a song structure that consists of a catchy chorus, gorgeous refrain and pre-chorus and beautiful verse and post-chorus. Read more on Last.fm.
